xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: The authors are very much indebted to the anonymous referees for their constructive and valuable comments and suggestions which greatly improved the original manuscript of this paper. The research of the first author is supported by Guangdong Natural Science Fund of China ( 10452902001005845 ), Program for Guangdong Excellent Talents in University, Guangdong Education Ministry, China ( LYM10128 ), and Science and technology project of Jiangmen City, China. The research of the second author is supported by Natural Science Foundation of Shanghai ( 11ZR1412500 ), Natural Science Foundation of China ( 11171205 ). The research of the third author is supported by Natural Science Fund of China ( 11101100 ).

organization.$: School of Mathematics and Computational Science
College of Mathematics and Computational Science

head.citation-title: On solutions of the quaternion matrix equation AX = B and their applications in color image restoration
head.abstracts: By using the complex representation of quaternion matrices, and the Moore-Penrose generalized inverse, we derive the expressions of the least squares solution with the least norm, the least squares pure imaginary solution with the least norm, and the least squares real solution with the least norm for the quaternion matrix equation AX=B, respectively. Finally, we discuss their applications in color image restoration. Â© 2013 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.

organization.$: School of Mathematics and Computational Science
